descriptions: No goal is set for choosing healthy foods.
A goal is mentioned, but it is vague and not focused on healthy food choices.
A goal is set, but it is either not realistic or not specific enough regarding healthy food choices.
A short-term goal is set for choosing healthy foods, but it lacks clarity or a plan for implementation.
A clear, short-term goal is set for choosing healthy foods, with some basic planning.
A well-defined, realistic short-term goal is set for choosing healthy foods for snacks and meals, including a detailed plan for implementation and potential obstacles.
Demonstrates no awareness of what constitutes healthy food choices.
Shows minimal understanding of healthy food choices.
Displays some awareness of healthy food choices but lacks detail.
Demonstrates adequate awareness of healthy food choices, identifying some key nutritional aspects.
Shows good awareness of healthy food choices, explaining nutritional benefits.
Exhibits comprehensive awareness of healthy food choices, detailing nutritional benefits and making informed decisions.
Does not attempt to apply the goal to real-life snack and meal choices.
Makes a weak attempt to apply the goal but with little connection to actual food choices.
Applies the goal to some snack or meal choices, but inconsistently.
Applies the goal to several snack and meal choices with reasonable consistency.
Consistently applies the goal to snack and meal choices, demonstrating practical understanding.
Masterfully applies the goal to all snack and meal choices, showing a deep understanding of how to make healthy food choices a regular part of their diet.
